Detailed Description

Two dimensional sensor model.

Contains permittivity distribution and boundary condition.

function draw_permittivity ( in  varargin  ) 

Draw permittivity representation of sensor in grid.

Two modes available auto or thresholds.

Parameters:
varargin{1} mode - auto or threshold
varargin{2} value of lower threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)
varargin{3} value of upper threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)
